full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,GZUNGS GZHUG DANG GNOD SBYIN 'KHOR LO SOGS RAB GNAS BYA TSUL PHUN TSOGS CHAR 'BEBS ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @013A *, ,(CES GZUNGS GZHUG DANG GNOD SBYIN 'KHOR LO SOGS RAB GNAS BYA TSUL PHUN TSOGS CHAR 'BEBS ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI, ,BSHAD @013B SGRUB BSTAN PA'I GSAL BYED MKHAS DANG GRUB PA'I DBANG PHYUG ,PHA BONG KHA PA 'JAM DBYANGS GRAGS PA SOGS KYIS MDZAD PA'I YIG CHA 'GA' ZHIG SNANG YANG GO SLA BAR DGOS NAS PHYAG LEN CHO GA'I YAN LAG 'GA' ZHIG GSAL BAR MA MDZAD 'DUG PAS, ,THAMS CAD TSANG ZHING GO SLA LA 'KHYER BDE BA CIG GYIS ZHES RGYAL KHAB CHEN PO PE'I CING GI KHRIMS LDAN 'DUS PA'I TSOGS LA LUG GNYIS KYI BSLAB BYA LEGS PAR SLOB PA'I PHO BRANG SHAR GYI JA SAG BLA MA PHUN TSOGS RGYA MTSO DANG, ,RAB 'BYAMS SMRA BA TSUL KHRIMS BZANG PO SOGS DON GNYER CAN 'GA' ZHIG GIS BSKUL BA'I NGOR, ,@014A *, ,YUL BYANG PHYOGS KYI MTHAR SKYES PA'I GYI NA NGAG DBANG BLO BZANG CHOS LDAN GYIS, ,DAM PA GONG MA'I YIG CHA DANG PHYAG LEN MTHONG BRGYUD LTAR, 'PHAGS PA 'JAM DPAL GYI GNAS MCHOG RI BO RTZE LNGAR BKOD PA'I YI GE PA NI DGE TSUL SMON LAM RIN CHEN NO, ,'DIS KYANG RGYAL BA BLO BZANG GRAGS PA'I BSTAN PA PHYUGS DUS THAMS CAD DU DAR ZHING RGYAS LA YUN RING DU GNAS PAR GYUR CIG , ,,BKRA SHIS PAR GYUR CIG , ,,)
